roleset.name: experience changes in scale, variety, changing

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: Statistics on acquisitions by foreigners vary in detail, because unlike Sansui, which is listed on the Tokyo and Osaka stock exchanges, most of the Japanese companies acquired by foreigners are privately held .
example.arg: because unlike Sansui , which is listed on the Tokyo and Osaka stock exchanges , most of the Japanese companies acquired by foreigners are privately held

example.name: pseudopassive
example.text: But they said [the C$30-a-share bid, which was due to expire Monday]-1, may still be extended or varied *trace*-1.

example.name: agentive
example.text: Typically, momey-fund yields beat comparable short-term investments because portfolio managers can vary maturities and go after the highest rates.

example.name: high and low points
example.text: John's weight varies from 98 to 500 pounds.

example.name: adjectival rel: varied
example.text: The problem is that funding of schools is so small and varied .

example.name: adjectival rel: variant
example.text: The common femoral artery has a high bifurcation at the mid femoral head level and the configuration of the bifurcation is variant so that the profunda arises anterolateral related to the SFA .
example.arg: so that the profunda arises anterolateral related tot he SFA

example.text: Variegated rubber plants sport attractive, waxy leaves that are noted for their variation of color from pale cream to deep evergreen.

roleset.note:
VARY-V NOTES: Frames file for 'vary' based on sentences in financial subcorpus, adjectival usage 'varied' based on BOLT-1; adjectival 'variant' based on medi-seedcorpus. Member of VNcls calibratable_cos-45.6-1, other_cos-45.4, differ-23.4. Comparison with fluctuate. (from vary.01-v)
VARIATION-N NOTES: (from variation.01-n)
VARIED-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from varied.01-j)
VARIABLE-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from variable.01-j)
VARIANT-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from variant.01-j)

roleset.name: allow to act contrary to a rule or regulation,

role.descr: entity allowed to break the rule

example.name: Common for building
example.text: A zoning variance may only be granted if it meets all the requirements found in the state law.

example.name: Be careful with arg 1 and arg 2
example.text: Donald Trump's zoning variance didn't come through.

roleset.note: variance.01: VARIANCE-N NOTES: Based on Bolt data. No comparison. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from variance.01-n)
